Categories.subtitle: From modern apartments to luxury villas, commercial spaces to hotel investments — explore curated property types across Turkey’s top cities.

HighlightsAndFeatures.title: Property Highlights & Special Features
HighlightsAndFeatures.description: Easily discover properties based on what matters most to you — from high-return investments and citizenship eligibility to luxury finishes, lifestyle benefits, and urgent offers. Use these tags to explore real estate tailored to your goals.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: EvimIstanbul Group offers a full range of services — from buying property, gaining Turkish citizenship, and starting a company, to student and family relocation, residence permits, bank accounts, medical tourism, lifestyle experiences, and more — all backed by expert guidance and global trust.

real_estate.title: Real Estate Acquisition
real_estate.description: Buy residential or commercial properties in Turkey with verified listings and legal guidance.

citizenship.title: Citizenship by Investment
citizenship.description: Invest in property to qualify for Turkish citizenship — fully supported from A to Z.

residence_permit.title: Residence Permit Application
residence_permit.description: Get expert help applying for Turkish residence permits: touristic, family, student, or investor.

company_formation.title: Company Formation in Turkey
company_formation.description: Start your business with complete legal setup, tax registration, and compliance support.

student_support.title: Student Immigration Support
student_support.description: Secure university placement, student visa, and housing — study in Turkey with full assistance.

family_relocation.title: Family Relocation Services
family_relocation.description: We manage school search, housing, and legal processes to relocate your family with ease.

bank_account.title: Bank Account Opening
bank_account.description: Open a personal or business bank account in Turkey — even without a residence permit.

work_permit.title: Work Permit Assistance
work_permit.description: Apply for a legal work permit and get documentation support for employment in Turkey.

medical_tourism.title: Medical Tourism Coordination
medical_tourism.description: Arrange safe, affordable treatment at trusted Turkish hospitals and clinics with local support.

money_transfer.title: Foreign Money Transfer
money_transfer.description: Legally transfer and convert foreign currency in Turkey through secure channels.

leisure_lifestyle.title: Tours & Leisure
leisure_lifestyle.description: City tours, boat trips, shopping, adventures, and unforgettable experiences across Turkey.

custom.title: Let’s Talk About Your Needs
custom.description: Didn’t find the exact service you’re looking for? Our team is ready to assist with personalized solutions tailored to your needs. Contact us to discuss your goals.

GuidesAndInsights.title: Our Guides & Insights
GuidesAndInsights.description: Get trusted and updated information on buying property, gaining citizenship, relocating to Turkey, and more — written for international buyers, investors, students, and families.

Partners.title: Who We Are?
Partners.subtitle: EvimIstanbul Group® is a trusted bridge between global clients and Opportunities in Turkey.
Partners.description: We help individuals and families invest, settle, and thrive by offering tailored solutions — from real estate to citizenship and legal pathways to education, healthcare, and lifestyle services. With multilingual support and a deep local network, we deliver clarity, safety, and long-term value every step of the way.

section1.title:
Why Choose
 EvimIstanbul Group?
section1.description: EvimIstanbul empowers international clients to confidently buy property in Turkey — including Istanbul, Antalya, and İzmir — by providing verified listings, expert guidance, and full-service support. From legal contracts to residence permits or Turkish citizenship by investment, we ensure a secure and seamless experience.
items: Expert legal & relocation support for foreign buyers
Citizenship & residency guidance for eligible clients

section2.title: Benefits of Choosing EvimIstanbul Group
section2.description: Whether you're investing for citizenship, relocating as a family, or studying in Turkey, EvimIstanbul offers personalized, transparent, and secure real estate solutions in top Turkish cities.
items: Legal and financial transparency — no hidden costs
$ 500M+ in successful transactions with global clients

testimonials.title: Client Stories and Testimonials
testimonials.description: Real experiences from global clients who’ve invested, relocated, or started a new life in Turkey with EvimIstanbul Group.

list.name: Ahmed S., UAE Investor
list.text: “EvimIstanbul  Group made my property purchase in Istanbul fast, legal, and stress-free. Their team helped me qualify for Turkish citizenship through real estate investment, and the process was smoother than I ever imagined. Highly recommended for serious international investors.”

list.name: Sarah D., UK Relocation Client
list.text: “We moved to Turkey with our two kids, and EvimIstanbul guided us from start to finish — school placement, residence permits, and finding the perfect home in Antalya. Their family relocation services are the best we’ve experienced abroad.”

list.name: Khaled M., Investor from Qatar
list.text: “I applied for Turkish citizenship by investing in property, and EvimIstanbul handled everything — from finding a legal project to managing the paperwork and translating documents. Their local expertise and transparent process gave me full confidence. I now own a luxury apartment in Istanbul and hold my Turkish passport.”

list.name: Mohammad R., International Student from Pakistan
list.text: “Thanks to EvimIstanbul, I was accepted into a Turkish university, secured student housing, and received my visa support without hassle. If you're planning to study in Turkey, trust them — they know exactly what to do.”

newsletter.title: Also we We’ll Guide You if

items.title: Thinking of Starting a Business in Turkey?
items.description: As a foreigner, you can legally establish a company in Turkey in just a few days. We handle all paperwork, tax registration, office place and business setup from A to Z.

items.title: Want to Study in Turkey?
items.description: We don’t just help you get into a university — we handle your student visa, residence permit, bank account, and housing setup so you can legally live and study in Turkey from day one.

items.title: Need Medical Treatment in Turkey?
items.description: From advanced treatments and cosmetic procedures to check-ups and surgeries — we handle it all. You’ll get fast-track access to Turkey’s best hospitals, translation support, accommodation, and even a residence permit if needed. Travel for health, return with peace of mind.

items.title: Relocating to Turkey With Your Family?
items.description: We turn relocation into a smooth, guided journey — from finding your dream home to enrolling your children in school, getting your family residence permits, and settling into a safe, welcoming community. You focus on your future, we handle the rest.
